mapper.insert: insert into house (id, title, price, area, room, floor, total_floor, watch_times, build_year, status, create_time, last_update_time, city_en_name, region_en_name, cover, direction, distance_to_subway, parlour, district, admin_id, bathroom, street) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{watchTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cityEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distanceToSubway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parlour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bathroom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update house set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_floor = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, watch_times = #{watchTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, build_year = #{buildYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, city_en_name = #{cityEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_en_name = #{regionEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, distance_to_subway = #{distanceToSubway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parlour = #{parlour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bathroom = #{bathroom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, price, area, room, floor, total_floor, watch_times, build_year, status, create_time, last_update_time, city_en_name, region_en_name, cover, direction, distance_to_subway, parlour, district, admin_id, bathroom, street from house where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, title, price, area, room, floor, total_floor, watch_times, build_year, status, create_time, last_update_time, city_en_name, region_en_name, cover, direction, distance_to_subway, parlour, district, admin_id, bathroom, street from house

insert into house
title,
price,
area,
room,
floor,
total_floor,

status,
city_en_name,

mapper.select:
select id, title, price, area, room, floor, total_floor, watch_times, build_year, status, create_time, last_update_time, city_en_name, region_en_name, cover, direction, distance_to_subway, parlour, district, admin_id, bathroom, street from house where admin_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 3
and create_time >= #{createTimeMin} and create_time <= #{createTimeMax}
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and city_en_name = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and title like CONCAT(#{title},'%')
order by id
order by title
order by area
order by price
order by floor
order by watch_times
order by create_time
desc
asc
mapper.update:
update house
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_floor = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
watch_times = #{watchTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
build_year = #{buildYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_en_name = #{cityEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region_en_name = #{regionEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
distance_to_subway = #{distanceToSubway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parlour = #{parlour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bathroom = #{bathroom,jdbcType=INTEGER},
street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from house a left join house_detail b on b.house_id = a.id where a.id in (${ids})
